Package com.netflix.hystrix.exception

Class HystrixTimeoutException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.netflix.hystrix.exception.HystrixTimeoutException

  • public class HystrixTimeoutException
extends java.lang.Exception
    An exception representing an error where the provided execution method took longer than the Hystrix timeout.

    Hystrix will trigger an exception of this type if it times out an execution. This class is public, so user-defined execution methods (HystrixCommand.run() / {@link HystrixObservableCommand#construct()) may also throw this error. If you want some types of failures to be counted as timeouts, you may wrap those failures in a HystrixTimeoutException. See https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix/issues/920 for more discussion.

    See Also:
